description: Naturally muscular, perpetually horny & friendly as hell, Lance is a wet dream come true. And it's not that he's just photogenic? he really is as hot as he looks and then some! Not that's a winning trifecta if I ever saw one.If that wasn't enough, he has a ready smile, a good sence of humor and isn't just a hot guy - he's a nice guy too.Seeing the pleasure on that handsome face as he recounts some of his wild sexpolits is almost as hot as the effect it has on him. He doesn't just whip off a load, he makes loves to that mouth watering cock & lets loose a shower of jizz we're still trying to clean off the walls!
title: Mr. Good Time, Scene #01
